WHYME.DESCRIPTION: Why are you passionate about programming? You can mention some key qualities such as analytical thinking, creativity, perseverance, and teamwork. A solution-oriented mindset is always an advantage.

MYSKILLS.INFOTEXT: I am motivated to continuously expand my skills and implement innovative solutions. At the same time, I stay up to date with new technologies and current trends.

Tab1.CONTENT1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks via drag & drop, assign users and categories.
Tab1.CONTENT2: My code is divided into clearly structured modules (UI, services, Firebase integration) to ensure reusability. Files, variables, and classes are consistently and descriptively named. Documentation is done directly in the code using JS Doc comments for better understanding. I ensure code quality with Prettier and version control with Git.
Tab1.CONTENT3: Our team consisted of 4 people. In this project, my task was to create the task components. The technologies were of course HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with reading and storing data via Firebase being the main implementation. It was a very good team, and we worked together harmoniously.

Tab1.CONTENT2: My code is divided into clear modules (HTML, CSS, Canvas rendering, JS logic) for better maintainability. Files, variables, functions, and classes are consistently and descriptively named. Important functions are documented with JSDoc, and complex logic gets short comments. Git is used for version control and clean commit structure.
Tab1.CONTENT3: I enjoyed working on this project because I was able to deepen my knowledge in HTML, CSS, Canvas, and JavaScript. Working with the Canvas API for drawings, animations, and interactive elements was particularly interesting.

Tab1.CONTENT1: With the help of JavaScript, I retrieved data from a Pokémon API and processed it as JSON. The results were then dynamically displayed in the browser.
Tab1.CONTENT2: First, I created the HTML structure and styled the layout with CSS. Then I implemented the logic with JavaScript and built functions modularly. Finally, I integrated fetching and processing data from web APIs to display dynamic content.
Tab1.CONTENT3: I enjoyed working on this project because I was able to deepen my knowledge in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Retrieving and processing data from web APIs was particularly interesting.

TEAMPLAYER.HEADLINE: Do you need a team player? Hear what my colleagues say about me

PLAYER.DESCRIPTION: "Christian was really a great help to the team. He is very supportive, always patient, and absolutely reliable. His structured way of working has often helped us move forward. Simply someone with whom collaboration is really pleasant and productive."

"Christian proved to be an extremely competent and committed teammate. He thinks independently, contributes his own ideas, and works very reliably. Particularly valuable was his clear and open communication, which made our collaboration effective and enjoyable. He actively participated in group discussions and, with his friendly and humorous demeanor, created a great atmosphere in the team."

"I had the pleasure of working with Christian on a web development project. He impressed with technical knowledge, clear structure, and solution-oriented thinking. Especially his communicative nature and teamwork skills made the project efficient and successful. Highly recommended!"

CONTACT.HEADLINE: Contact me
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Feel free to reach out if you have a job offer or an opportunity where I can contribute my knowledge as a master electrician and programmer. I am particularly interested in roles in IoT, embedded systems, smart home technologies, and modern web development (Angular, SCSS, Firebase).
CONTACT.PRIVACYPOLICY_NOTICE: I have read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as described.
